answers.answer: Sorry about the diagnosis, but at least it isn't going to go untreated.My son has Type one diabetes. He hates the shots. He isn't thrilled with the finger jabs, either.I did the glucose testing several times a day for three months. The finger sticking isn't too bad, but it gets old after a while.Look on the bright side. You'll feel better.Easy for me to say. I didn't come home with a new diagnosis.We really took our perfect health for granted when we were younger, eh? I know I just assumed it would go on and on and on.
So sorry you now have this to the list .. you know we are here for you my friend.  Have a good vacation and be certain to ck. back here ok .. promise?

I'm so sorry.  Yeah, it's like adding insult to injury, isn't it.  :-(make sure that you can get in to see a nutritionist at the hospital.  That really helped me (before the LID and I completely lost my mind with diets).  The nutritionist was great at helping me figure out a diet plan and emphasise the need to eat 5-6 small meals a day (which I really need to start doing again).Hang in there - you are in very good company.
Crud VMy bad............ I really didn't think it was it.When will this autoimmune stuff  balance out??  Talk to DAC - she is really doing well on her stuff.

Thankyou all for all the good messages. I am dealing with it pretty well this morning. We are getting ready for our trip this morning.I still dont wnat to test myself. I am such a big weenie.LOLyou guys have a great week. I think they have a computer at the lodge so I will check in and tell you all of our adventures.Love Venora

question: Its confirmed yes I have diabetes. got my med and my test kit. I dont want to test my blood myself. I am going to have my husband stick me. good thing I dont have to take insulin injections.So now I have 4 meds I have to take the rest of my life.Like how many pills will I need to be on by the time I am 60?I am pretty bummed about the  diabetes but I guess I will come to terms with it eventually besides if the med helps me feel better I am ok with it. I have been so tired and going to the potty every 30 minustes, LOL no wonder i am tired peeing all the time.so thanks for all your support and prayers. I love you guys.Love Venora
